abstract: Shares of Citigroup jumped nearly 10 percent Monday, as investors seemed to take comfort in reports that the United States government may raise its stake in the troubled lending giant to 25 percent to 40 percent.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Citigroup jumped nearly 10 percent Monday, as investors seemed to take comfort in reports that the United States government may raise its stake in the troubled lending giant to 25 percent to 40 percent.

headline.main: Would a 40% Government Stake in Citi Be Enough?
